name: Magic Carpet Sally
description:
A game of high-altitude adventure and high speed,
MAGIC CARPET SALLY★
Go higher and higher up the magic carpets with Sally!

How to play : )
Tap the screen to let Sally jump on the next magic carpet.
Don’t miss the treasures on the magic carpets.
When you reach the max booster gauge with the treasures you collected,
you can make a double jump!
But remember, you should succeed it in first try… gosh …

TIP : )
The higher you reach, the faster the speed of the magic carpets!
Even Sally doesn’t know when the red carpet will appear ☆
You should jump right away when you see the red carpet!
(It won’t come back…)


#MCsally #SALLY #LINE Friends #LINE #RETRO
